snippet: The Yankees signed outfielder Preston Mattingly, the son of the former Yankees first baseman Don Mattingly, to a minor league contract.
abstract: The Yankees signed outfielder Preston Mattingly, the son of the former Yankees first baseman Don Mattingly, to a minor league contract.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees signed the free-agent minor league outfielder Preston Mattingly, the son of the former Yankees first baseman Don Mattingly, to a minor league contract.
